episodes.synopsis: As spring awakens animals from hibernation, a season of mating, building dwellings, tending the young and finding food for survival unfolds.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Summer's heat brings prolonged thirst to a place where each day, animals search for shade and water as they battle to stay alive.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: As autumn descends, the clock ticks for animals born in spring whose survival depends on being fully mature and prepared for winter's oncoming chill.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: As snow, rain and cold shroud the land, some animals hibernate while others migrate or tough it out in a winter landscape where conditions are harsh.
episodes.title: Episode 4

video.title: Wild Iberia
video.synopsis: The flora and fauna of the spectacular Iberian Peninsula are explored, and its changes are tracked throughout the four seasons.
